statements: SELECT * FROM customer_communications;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_timestamp FROM customer_communications WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_communications GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT communication_id, communication_channel, communication_content FROM customer_communications WHERE communication_channel = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM customer_communications WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_channel FROM customer_communications WHERE communication_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND communication_timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(communication_id) AS total_communications FROM customer_communications GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_communications > 5 ORDER BY total_communications DESC;
SELECT communication_content FROM customer_communications WHERE communication_channel LIKE '%email%' OR communication_channel LIKE '%chat%' ORDER BY communication_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, communication_channel, DATE(communication_timestamp) AS communication_date FROM customer_communications WHERE DATE(communication_timestamp) = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, date_created FROM customers ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, cm.channel, cm.datetime_sent FROM customers c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.customer_id = cm.customer_id WHERE cm.channel = 'Email' ORDER BY cm.datetime_sent ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, channel, communication_type, datetime_sent FROM customers c LEFT JOIN communications cm ON c.customer_id = cm.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC, datetime_sent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, timestamp FROM customers INNER JOIN phone_calls ON customers.customer_id = phone_calls.customer_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails INNER JOIN customers ON emails.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE emails.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT call_id, phone_number, duration, timestamp FROM phone_calls WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_communications;
SELECT subject, customer_id, timestamp FROM phone_communications WHERE call_type = 'Inbound';
SELECT id, email_address, body FROM email_communications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_description, customer_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback' AND customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM chat_communications WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_communications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT subject, email_address FROM email_communications WHERE customer_id = 12345
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM email_communications GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails > 5
SELECT * FROM phone_communications WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customer_interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT email_subject, email_timestamp FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT chat_transcript FROM chats WHERE customer_id = 1002 ORDER BY chat_timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_subject, email_timestamp FROM emails ORDER BY email_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, call_duration, call_timestamp FROM phone_calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels WHERE channel_type = 'Social';
